website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede Classic+ is an upgraded version of its predecessor by offering it in an expanded selection of colors and a wider toebox. It retains its well-loved retro style but now with a more comfortable fit and feel. Apart from its improved comfort, the pair’s classic design is easy to pair with any casual look, which makes for a superb everyday go-to shoe.Moreover, the kick’s wide array of colorways can add a pop of color to your ensemble that could elevate it to a more stylish look. Ultimately, the shoe’s rich history, time-tested quality, and great reputation in the sneaker world could be enough deciding factor to many sneaker fans.
pros: An overwhelming majority of purchasers admired the shoe’s retro yet classic design
The Puma Suede Classic+ is structured wider than its predecessor, which some long-time fans appreciate
The shoe model has a rich background and is one of the most iconic sneakers of all time
This is why a good number of consumers put the shoe in such high regard
The shoe is true to size, based on most of the reviews
A lot of buyers find that the shoe is good value for money
Several shoe users mentioned that shoe’s construction is of good quality and very durable
A significant number of wearers said that the Puma Suede Classic+ is very comfortable
Some reviewers happy the shoe is a head turner and that they get compliments every time they wear the shoe out
A few shoe owners were delighted that they can easily pair it with almost any casual clothes they have in their wardrobe
The Suede Classic+ from Puma is available in an array of different colorways
cons: A handful of wearers found the shoe’s toebox too narrow
Some shoe users disclosed that the shoe’s color bleeds when it’s wet

My feet are a bit wide, but I had no problem with this trainer's narrow fit and required no wearing in. Highly recommended and already considering some other colour options.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Suede Classic + Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description:
Puma Suede classic+ sneaker for men

The cool sports shoe is an absolute classic thanks to its design with suede components.

 * This casual shoe has been in the Puma footwear collection for decades and is one of the popular and best-known sneakers of the German sports brand.
 * Due to the suede upper material, the urban low shoe with it's matching laces is an absolute eye-catcher.
 * This running shoe model significantly contributed to the success of the Puma brand. Puma sneakers add a sporty look to every outfit.
 * What to combine a casual outfit with? These sneakers are always a game changer: Puma's footwear is for both professional athletes and stylish amateurs.
 * These trainers are made out of innovative and high quality materials. The sport-shoes by Puma impress with their touch and become the key piece of every casual outfit.

Puma-Forever Faster
As one of the world's leading sports brands, it's only natural that we want to stand on the same playing field as the fastest athletes on the planet. We have the right sportswear for every sport, combining advanced technology and functionality with casual style. No matter which size or colour: Puma brings style into running and training, and adds performance to motorsports. In the light of Puma's Forever Faster mission, we bring a high level of brand heat to sports and elevate Puma to the next level.
